value.title: Quick guide to create new Dataflows in Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you confused by the four options available on the create Power BI dataflows welcome screen? In this video I will go through each of them and give you at the end the business user guide to it. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. For example, if you were displaying revenue by country and had no sales in Norway, then Norway would not appear anywhere in your visualization.  In this video we will show you how to display empty categories or show

value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
